content: yo pull up yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through all remaining loops treble_crochet = triple crochet = yo twice insert hook in the center of next chain yo draw yarn through stitch yo draw yarn through 2 loops on hook 3 times half trip decrease = yo twice insert into next stitch yo pull up yo pull through 2 loops yo insert into next stitch yo pull up yo pull through all remaining loops table of contents caterpillar face page 4-5 pear page 5-6 swiss cheese page 6 salami page 6 sausage page 7 green leaf page 8 butterfly page 8-9 you will need a round bin approximately 16 tall x 13 diameter you can also use collapsible round laundry bins you will need yarn for each individual piece of food crochet hooks darning needle scissors and polyfil stuffing here is a photo of each food item from the book https //i pinimg com/736x/43/a6/7d/43a67de417cc0e0a5cf56262b31f9376--food-cards-hungry-caterpillar-food-labels jpg page | 2 © 2017 megan lapp all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by crafty intentions crochet the following pieces 1 crochet the hungry caterpillar face the hungry caterpillar face is in the downloadable pattern this is a tie-on cover that is easy for little hands to slip onto and off of the top of the round plastic bin see below page 4 - 5 2 crochet one red apple follow this free pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/apple-27 the pattern comes in spanish and english tip make sure to add the stem and leaf for a high-quality look 3 crochet two green pears see below page 6 tip add the same stem you used in the free apple pattern 4 crochet three purple plums follow this free pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/1st-trimester-pregnancy-fruit-set tip make sure to add the leaf and divot in the fruit 5 crochet four strawberries follow this free pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crocheted-strawberry 6 crochet five oranges follow this free pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/orange-2 tip definitely use the small green yarn in the piece 7 crochet one piece of chocolate cake follow this free pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/yellow-cake-with-chocolate-frosting tip this is a tissue box cosy do not create the hole in the top of the cosy for the tissue use an empty tissue box to stuff this pattern if you want to ensure that it will survive hard play either wrap the empty tissue box in duct tape to seal it/make it stronger or instead of a cardboard tissue box build your own same-size
